name: Christmas In Dino-Town
description:
15min
7MB (no sound on mobile, unfortunately)
Content: Christmas

I made this game for the 2018 Bitsy Secret Santa as a gift for Nina!

The 3 words I had to start from were Dino, Cake, and Static. So I made a game about a dino, trying to bake a cake, guided by static!

I used some assets from an old project of mine to get started, and I totally stole all music from Doctor Octoroc and 8-bit Universe after hastily googling 'christmas chiptune.'
